TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Image extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Displays an image on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制可讓您使用映像從伺服端程式碼。The control lets you work with images from server code. 使用控制項來顯示支援要求的瀏覽器，在網頁上的任何有效的映像。Use the control to display any valid image supported by the requesting browser on the Web page. 顯示映像的路徑設定，來指定屬性。The path to the displayed image is specified by setting the property. 您可以指定要顯示影像取代影像無法使用時所設定的文字屬性。You can specify the text to display in place of image when the image is not available by setting the property. 設定來指定相對於在網頁上的其他項目影像的對齊屬性。The alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page is specified by setting property. > [!NOTE] > 這個控制項只會顯示映像。This control only displays an image. 如果您要擷取的映像上按一下滑鼠按鍵時，請使用控制項。If you need to capture mouse clicks on the image, use the control. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立網頁上的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create an control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.Image Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.Image Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含呈現在用戶端瀏覽器上的輸出資料流。

span.span: A that contains the output stream to render on the client browser.

summary.span: 將 的屬性加入輸出資料流中，以便在用戶端呈現。

span.span: Adds the attributes of an to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓一律顯示為含有細的框線。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the always displays with a thin border. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_image_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_image_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_image_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_image_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AlternateText { get; set; }
.property instance string AlternateText
Public Overridable Property AlternateText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當沒有影像時，要顯示於 控制項的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

summary.span: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器將這個文字顯示為工具提示。

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip.

value.span: 在沒有影像時 控制項中顯示的替代文字。

span.span: The alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示如果映像中指定的文字屬性會無法使用。Use this property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示功能，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also displays as a ToolTip. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定無法使用映像時顯示影像的替代文字。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display for the image when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DescriptionUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string DescriptionUrl
Public Overridable Property DescriptionUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DescriptionUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定影像詳細說明的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location to a detailed description for the image.

value.span: 含有影像詳細說明之檔案的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the file that contains a detailed description for the image.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定的 HTML 檔案，提供映像的其他詳細資料。The property specifies an HTML file that provides additional details for the image. 屬性轉譯成`longdesc`影像控制項的屬性。The property renders as the `longdesc` attribute for the image control. 如果屬性未設定，或設為空字串 ("")，則控制項呈現不含`longdesc`屬性。If the property is not set, or is set to an empty string (""), the control renders without the `longdesc` attribute. 使用屬性來補充屬性。Use the property to supplement the property. 比方說，如果您使用控制項來顯示太陽系的映像，您可以設定屬性`The Solar System,`，然後設定屬性，以進一步描述這顆恆在 sun 行星的映像的 HTML 網頁太陽系中。For example, if you use an control to display an image of the solar system, you can set the property to `The Solar System,` and then set the property to an HTML page that further describes the image of planets orbiting the sun in the solar system. 屬性是選擇性的但是可以增強網頁瀏覽器使用純文字的協助工具，螢幕助讀員。The property is optional, but it can enhance the accessibility of your Web page for text-only browsers and screen readers. 瀏覽器可以使用詳細的文字描述，來傳達重要的概念，取代，或是加視覺影像。Browsers can use the detailed text description to convey important concepts in place of, or in addition to, the visual image. 您的瀏覽器文件，其使用方式描述所指定的內容的詳細資訊，請參閱`longdesc`屬性。Refer to your browser documentation for details on how it uses the descriptive content specified by the `longdesc` attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Enabled { get; set; }
.property instance bool Enabled
Public Overrides Property Enabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於控制項。This property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control.

summary.span: 取得與控制項關聯之文字的字型屬性。

span.span: Gets the font properties for the text associated with the control.

value.span: ，包含與控制項關聯之文字的屬性。

span.span: A that contains the properties for the text associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於控制項。This property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool GenerateEmptyAlternateText { get; set; }
.property instance bool GenerateEmptyAlternateText
Public Overridable Property GenerateEmptyAlternateText As Boolean
public: virtual property bool GenerateEmptyAlternateText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否為空字串值產生替代文字屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate text attribute for an empty string value.

value.span: 如果控制項為空字串值產生替代文字屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control generates the alternate text attribute for an empty string value; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當未設定屬性，控制項不包含`alt`屬性來指定替代文字控制項的呈現。By default, when the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate text in the control rendering. 設定屬性`true`永遠轉譯輸出中包含的替代文字屬性控制項。Set the property to `true` to always include the alternate text attribute in rendered output for the control. XHTML 文件類型定義需要`alt`影像控制項上的屬性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 不過，協助工具最佳作法建議並不會傳遞網頁的內容相關的資訊的影像控制項不應該指定`alt`屬性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 您可以藉由設定符合 XHTML 和協助工具需求屬性`true`。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign ImageAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign ImageAlign
Public Overridable Property ImageAlign As ImageAlign
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign ImageAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項相對於 Web 網頁上其他項目的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定相對於在網頁上的其他項目影像的對齊。Use the property to specify or determine the alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page. 下表列出可能的對齊方式。The following table lists the possible alignments. |對齊Alignment|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定對齊。The alignment is not set.| |`Left`|影像在 Web 網頁的左邊緣對齊而文字在右邊換行。The image is aligned on the left edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the right.| |`Right`|影像在 Web 網頁的右邊緣對齊而文字在左邊換行。The image is aligned on the right edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the left.| |`Baseline`|影像的下邊緣與第一行文字的下邊緣對齊。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Top`|影像的上邊緣與同一行最高項目的上邊緣對齊。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest element on the same line.| |`Middle`|影像的中間與第一行文字的下邊緣對齊。The middle of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Bottom`|影像的下邊緣與第一行文字的下邊緣對齊。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`AbsBottom`|影像的下邊緣與同一行最大項目的下邊緣對齊。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the largest element on the same line.| |`AbsMiddle`|影像的中間與同一行最大項目的中間對齊。The middle of the image is aligned with the middle of the largest element on the same line.| |`TextTop`|影像的上邊緣與同一行最高文字的上邊緣對齊。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest text on the same line.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ImageUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string ImageUrl
Public Overridable Property ImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 URL，這個 URL 提供要顯示於 控制項中之影像的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

value.span: URL，提供要顯示於 控制項中之影像的路徑。

span.span: The URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在中顯示的影像 URL控制項。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the control. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相對的 URL 相關的網頁位置之影像的位置不在伺服器上指定完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁上的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您容易到另一個目錄移動整個站台伺服器上而不更新程式碼。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 絕對 URL 會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要您更新程式碼。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示在 映像的位置控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderContents(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub RenderContents (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void RenderContents(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將影像控制項的內容呈現在指定的寫入器。

span.span: Renders the image control contents to the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 控制實作方法略過的任何子控制項的轉譯。The control implements the method to skip rendering of any child controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便之後一律會顯示一些文字。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that some text is always displayed after the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontentscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontentsvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontents.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0，否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
